item.title: Mashed potatoes
item.description: Prep: 5 minutes Cook: 20 minutes Total: 25 minutes Servings: 2 Ingredients Kosher salt 1 1/2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes 1/2 cup whole milk or heavy cream, plus more as needed 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, plus more as needed 1 ounce cream cheese or sour cream, at room temperature (optional) Freshly ground black pepper Steps Place a pot of salted water on heat Meanwhile, prep potatoes by cutting into small chunks (~1cm) When water is boiling add potatoes until tender (15-20 minutes) While potatoes boil, warm 1 tbsp of butter and a half cup of milk When potatoes are soft, drain and return to pan over medium heat Add warm butter.
